name: Turkey Shepherd's Pie
author: ANGCHICK
summary: A healthy twist on an old favorite.
directions: Boil potatoes until tender, 15 to 20 minutes
While potatoes are cooking, gather other ingredients
Mash potatoes with butter and milk
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion
Saute onion until it has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes
Stir in ground turkey, carrot, mushrooms, parsley, thyme, garlic, and chicken bouillon
Cook and stir until meat is broken up and cooked through
Add salt and pepper to taste
Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute more
Transfer meat mixture to a deep dish pie pan or casserole dish
Spread mashed potatoes over meat, and swirl with a fork
Bake in preheated oven until tops of mashed potatoes are lightly browned, about 30 minutes
